nodes.message: Area is blocked off once treasure has been gotten
nodes.commentor: XXX This Case Should not Occur

nodes.text: I shouldn't be here - we ransacked it pretty good last time!
Whoa!
We did it!! I've finally found the pirate treasure!
Congratulations Katie! Your dad is sure to recognize that you can be a pirate too.
Yeah, but funny thing... after all we've been through here, I don't really want to be a pirate.
Wait - What?
Yeah, well, we can see what being a pirate is all about - betrayal, death, Zombies... All of this treasure has blood on it.
We could wash it off...?

I'm going to use this treasure to turn our family inn into a home for old sailors. It will give seamen a place to go when they can't sail any longer. They won't have to wind up dying in a place like this.
Man, you're going to have a tough time hauling all of this back yourself. I could probably help you out by taking some off your hands...
Ha! So you did want some gold afterall, huh Shawn? Guess there might be a little pirate in you, too.
No. I'm going to wait until my father is back in port. I'll have him and his crew haul this out.
Since you couldn't have done this without my help, we can just split this treasure. You can have that half of the room, I'll take this half.
Ugh... figures. I knew you just wanted the treasure for yourself!
Well, it's only fair...
You never would have even known of this treasure if I hadn't told you about it. Nor would you ever have been able to get to it without me.
I'm going to use this treasure for a good cause - a home for retired sailors. It's probably going to take all of this money and more to do that.
You were a big help, though. I can't let you walk off completely empty-handed.
Here's your share of the booty. That should cover your losses at Poobah for a few sessions.
Three hundred and fifty doubloons... er... Lyra? Wow, I'm rich!
Two hundred and fifty Lyra is a lot of money for me.
Three hundred Lyra will go a long way towards my "Get-Rich-Quick" plans.
I can put this to good use.
There are a few interesting items in that chest near the door. Pick out something that suits your fancy.
Hmm... there's a fancy dagger, an ornate necklace with a purple gem and some sort of rune on it, and a dark grey cloak.
All of these items are magical!
The dagger in the chest was designed to enhance skills of stealth and agility.
The grey cloak feels like it was specially made for a rogue. It has a strong aura of stealth about it.
The Amulet strongly protects against hostile magic.
They all could be very useful under the right circumstances.
I get the feeling that these are magical. It's going to be hard to choose between them.
This dagger looks kinda interesting... more of a stabbing weapon than a slicing weapon but it is very sharp.
This cloak is soft and warm and fuzzy - It's also charcoal-grey and would be great for being sneaky in dark places.
The amulet is pretty and looks like it is glowing softly in the dark.
We'd better get going - the tide is starting to come in. We don't want to be trapped here.
Last one to the castle is Gog grog!

nodes.message: This prevents "go to bed" trigger which would happen if time incremented after midnight.

nodes.name: Treasure Ahoy Maties!
nodes.description: We did it! Katie and I defeated a tentacle monster with the help of a few of our Zombie crew members. Katie's got her treasure and I my share of the loot. Woot!
